name: Airman
description:
Controls:

Keyboard:

Movement : W, A, S, D

Fire : Space

Gamepad:

Movement : Left Thumbstick

Fire : Right Trigger

NOTE: You can use an XBox controller, however normal gamepads can be used after configuration with XOutput.

Also, if you connect 2 gamepads, you can play a multiplayer version of the game

Art Assets:

Background :  Mountain Dusk by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)

Explosion Sprite : Cuzco (Opengameart)

Explosion Sound : TeamAlpha

8-bit Sound Library : Little Robot Sound Factory

                                             (https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/)

Helicopter Sprite : Hobo (Opengameart)
